Chapter 1.title: The Awakening
Chapter 1.description: You wake up in the wasteland, disoriented and starving. Your journey begins.

choices.text: Search the ruins of an old shack.

result.description: You find a rusty knife and a can of beans.
You meet a merchant who offers you a map in exchange for 5 Credits.

Chapter 2.title: The Merchant's Offer
Chapter 2.description: You are now on the merchant's map. It leads to a vast desert.

result.description: You find a buried chest containing a water bottle and some scrap metal.

choices.text: Confront the merchant about a suspicious offer.

result.description: The merchant grows hostile and a fight ensues.

Chapter 3.title: A Desert Adventure
Chapter 3.description: The sun is scorching. You're running low on water.

result.description: You find a hidden oasis with fresh water.

choices.text: Set up camp for the night.

result.description: You hear distant voices. A group of raiders approaches.

Chapter 4.title: Merchant's Revenge
Chapter 4.description: You barely survived the fight. The merchant was tougher than expected.

result.description: You take a few items from the merchant's body and run.

choices.text: Bury him and continue on your journey.

result.description: You leave the merchant's body behind and head deeper into the desert.

Chapter 5.title: The Oasis
Chapter 5.description: The oasis offers respite, but thereâ€™s something eerie about it.

choices.text: Rest by the water and recover.

result.description: You regain some stamina but hear strange sounds in the distance.

Chapter 6.title: Raiders' Ambush
Chapter 6.description: The raiders are closing in. Your options are limited.

result.description: You draw your weapon and face the raiders.

choices.text: Hide and wait for them to leave.

result.description: You manage to stay hidden and avoid a fight, but your supplies are low.

Chapter 7.title: Desert Night
Chapter 7.description: You travel through the desert at night, using the map you found.

choices.text: Follow the map to the rumored city.

result.description: The map leads you to a hidden city of ruins.

choices.text: Camp for the night and rest.

result.description: You are awakened by strange sounds in the night. A mutant beast is approaching.
